column5: My supervisor asked me to look into finding the A+ certification course, and he said i can go away, or stay and do it online...i would rather do it online, so i am wondering if anybody out there has taken the course online or know of a reputable site that i can take it online...something like distant learning.  thanks!

Everything you need is right here:  http://www.comptia.org/certifications/listed/a.aspx  Comptia is the org that makes and administers all these types of certs. From there you can find online resources, names of books and software, whatever you need.  Good luck. I got certified in 2003 and I used a book and self study. My college at the time was offering a 2 week intensive for like $2500, but I just did it on my own.
Or you can check out the bay of pirates and search for A+ Cert (you'll find all the current tests and brain dumps!)  PM ME for a link, as I assume you have no idea what I'm talking about.
